Parent/Student App Features

Attendance Notifications

Instant alerts when a student is marked present or absent.

Performance Tracking

View marks and attendance percentages in real time.

Timetable Access

Check daily and weekly class schedules.

Holiday Notifications

Stay updated on school holidays and announcements.

Homework & Assignments

View, download, and submit homework.

Exam Results

Access detailed subject-wise scores and analysis.

Report Cards

Download progress reports and term-wise results.

Achievements

Track awards and extracurricular activities.

Teacher Communication

Chat directly with teachers for queries.

School Announcements

Receive real-time updates and news.

Reminders & Alerts

Set reminders for exams, assignments, and deadlines.

Fee Payment & Tracking

Pay school fees online and track payments.

Transport Tracking

Monitor real-time school bus location.

Library Access

View borrowed books and due dates.

Medical Records

Access health updates and vaccination details.

Event Participation

Register for school activities and competitions.

Online Classes

Join live sessions and view recorded lessons.

Multi-Child Support

Manage multiple student profiles in one app.

Surveys & Feedback

Provide feedback on school events and policies.
